subhead: The recognition of the State of Palestine by 11 more countries has revived the debate over what form it could take. From pragmatic to utopian, here are the main ideas that have emerged since the creation of Israel.

title: Colombia's president accuses US of violating sovereignty and committing 'murder'
subhead: President Gustavo Petro condemned the killing of a Colombian fisherman during a US operation hailed by Donald Trump as a blow to 'narcoterrorists.'

title: Madagascar's coup leader Michael Randrianirina seeks legitimacy
subhead: The head of the Capsat, the unit that overthrew Andry Rajoelina, was inaugurated as president on Friday and has reassured the international community that his country won't be sanctioned.

title: Tommy Robinson, a racist hooligan turned mass mobilizer
subhead: 'The new faces of the far right' (1/5). Stephen Yaxley-Lennon, known as Tommy Robinson, has seen his following surge in the UK since Elon Musk reinstated his X account. His ability to mobilize tens of thousands has placed him at the center of British politics.

title: Denis Charbit: 'In Israel, compassion for the hostages justified indifference to Palestinian suffering'
